participant_1.background:
I start my senior year of high school next week.
My mom is a painter.
I went to japan this summer.
My favorite sport is hockey.
My best friend just moved away.

participant_2.background:
I am a free spirit.
I like to live off of the land.
I am all about family and fun.
My parents were like this as well.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. I'm starting my senior year of high school next week.
Hi, I'm participant_2. I'm a free spirit. I like to live off the land and I'm all about family and fun.
That's cool. I like to go camping and hiking. I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love to go camping and hiking too. I went to Japan this summer and did a lot of hiking. It was amazing!
That sounds awesome! I've always wanted to go to Japan. What was your favorite part about it?
My favorite part was the food. The food in Japan is amazing! I also loved the culture and the people. Everyone was so friendly and welcoming.
That sounds great. I'm sure I would love it there too.
You should definitely go sometime! It's an amazing place.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to play hockey. I'm on the varsity team at my school.
That's awesome! I used to play hockey when I was younger. It's a lot of fun.
Yeah, it is. I love the rush of playing the game.
I can imagine. I miss playing hockey.
Well, you can always pick it up again!
Maybe I will. It would be fun to play again.
That would be great! I'd love to play with you sometime.
